Articles.Content: i like. i very much like
Yeah.. not feeling the heat-shield.
if you\'re going for realism than you should definitely go for black over orange.

if you\'re going for realism than you should definitely go for black over orange.

no. Dragons heatshield isalso not black.

However i do have a suggestion. Take some red out of it and add some yellow. Currently it is Cheeze-it color. More yellow would be better?
hello, just dropping the saturation of it down 40 looks good.
meh, i\'ll prob change the saturation to 0 anyways lol

meh, i\'ll prob change the saturation to 0 anyways lol

you never like anyone stuff Gorjia you know that? you only ever complain. never any compliments.

you never like anyone stuff Gorjia you know that? you only ever complain. never any compliments.

I\'m a perfectionist lol

I love the shuttle, and I love your parts.

I\'m just nitpicky about some things.

I do not mean to offend anyone when I post.

I\'m a perfectionist lol

I love the shuttle, and I love your parts.

I\'m just nitpicky about some things.

I do not mean to offend anyone when I post.

you could try and be more positive. saying 'I want this now... hey change this.. Don;t care make it ten different sizes NOW! and I want it before anyo9ne else!' and not 'oh i like it' it is really annoying.

and if you are a perfectionist. go play orbiter or learn to model

yeah, i should be less condescending

i am trying to model though lol

hello, just dropping the saturation of it down 40 looks good.

-snip-

It looks like the heat shield is made of slightly-toasted bread.
eh i like the orange in all honesty.

While I think dark grays and blacks would probably look better on the underside, the yellow strip on the edge of the wings, what I\'m assuming to be an elevator, and around the engine mount is visually pleasing with the red and white paint scheme.
Why not call it the pegasus

Absolutely amazing! I for one dig the heat-shielding. Maybe darken it a bit?

Can\'t wait to give this a test-flight.
I love it, very Kerbal looking. I too like the heat shield, especially that 40% desaturated version.
I myself like the bright orange.
Great looking shuttle. I don\'t care what you do with the heatshield. The top is very colorful and visually appealing, keep it as it is!

I\'m ok with the orange color, so long as it\'s consistent. The only problem I have is that the top of the nose has black heat tiles, and there\'s black trim everywhere; but the bottom uses the orange tiles.
Hmm. Orange nose tiles might look nice

Hmm. Orange nose tiles might look nice

Seconded because of curiosity.
I am not sure about that engine. It...it\'s a bit big, isn\'t it?

I\'m ok with the orange color, so long as it\'s consistent. The only problem I have is that the top of the nose has black heat tiles, and there\'s black trim everywhere; but the bottom uses the orange tiles.

This.

Not that it matters too much either way. I\'ll still be using it. This is by far my favourite pack!

I am not sure about that engine. It...it\'s a bit big, isn\'t it?

Burn the heretic!

Preferably with that incredibly Kerbal engine. Can\'t wait for the release!

I am not sure about that engine. It...it\'s a bit big, isn\'t it?

The engine isn\'t big; the plane is small.

The body is only 1 metre in diameter.

---

As for the heat shield: I\'m leaving it orange.

If you don\'t like it, then you\'ll just have to...

Alright... I guess I can make an optional texture pack with a black heat shield. I suppose.

Keep in mind that all the images show the heat shield in direct sunlight. It\'s not always that bright.

---

In other news, I was able to make my first smooth landing in the Ausplane just a few minutes ago.

It\'s really starting to feel like a solid piece of hardware.
